Friends

A timeless ensemble sitcom following six New Yorkers through laughter, heartbreak, and the everyday adventures of love and friendship in a cozy Manhattan apartment.

Suits

A sharp, fast-paced legal drama where a brilliant college dropout teams up with a top New York attorney—battling high-stakes cases, office politics, and their own unlikely partnership.

Young Sheldon

Young Sheldon is a heartwarming comedy‐drama that follows genius prodigy Sheldon Cooper navigating family, school, and small-town life in East Texas.

Big Bang Theory

The Big Bang Theory is a witty ensemble sitcom following brilliant yet socially awkward physicists as they navigate friendship, romance, and the quirks of everyday life in Pasadena.

Money Heist

Money Heist is a gripping, character-driven heist thriller in which the enigmatic “Professor” gathers a team of misfits to execute an intricate robbery of Spain’s Royal Mint—testing loyalties, outsmarting the police, and risking everything for the ultimate payoff.

The Crown

A lavish, character-driven historical saga tracing Queen Elizabeth II’s reign—from youthful optimism to the heavy burden of monarchy against a changing world.
